title: Kha' Zix Jungle
body:
Mobafire is useless, how do I jungle with Kha' Zix,
meaning runes, masteries, builds and jungle paths.{{champion:121}}

replies.body: Listen you should jungle as Rek'sai{{champion:421}} He is the better option
I don't know who you should main, I play both but main Rengar preferably as people can actually decide what kind of build suits him

the choice is how do you play a jungle assassin? Rengar{{champion:107}}  for ganking power or Kha'zix{{champion:121}}  for hypercarry power (By that i mean he snowballs heavily) personally, i love my Kha'zix.{{champion:121}} "Change is good"
